text: "Tempted" is a 1981 song by British band Squeeze and is the second single from their fourth studio album East Side Story. It was only a moderate hit at the time of its release, however it has become their most famous singles and appearing in TV shows, video games, commercials and in the 1994 movie Reality Bites It went to number 41 in the United Kingdom, number 45 in Canada and number 49 in the United States. ==Track listing== ===7"=== # "Tempted" (4:04) # "Yap Yap Yap" (4:13) ===7" (US release)=== # "Tempted" (3:53) # "Trust" (1:45) == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Squeeze (band) songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Rock songs
title: Tempted (Squeeze song)
